translation: (yʿny) vandkyv th ryth kal kyv sfrv sintụ̄ (bne) ʿạdy (vand th ryth kal kyv sfrv nishhi chih murad tjarty sfr. Ryth kals ạsụ̄ qrysh lukh shams th flsṭyns kun th vnds ạsụ̄ jnvb ʿrbs kun tjart kh ghrẓh gczhan, yimve sfrv hndi bdvlt bne tim maldar)
Lhādha pzi timn zi aamhi gr kis rbs krin ʿbadt. (aamhi gr nishhi chuh murad khanh kʿbh)

Yymụ̄ tim bochihh nishhi bchạvith khyavnạvụ̄, th khvfh nishhi bchạvith kvrnkh aamn ʿṭa. (mkh avs chvnkh ḥrm, aamhi mvjvb avs nh qryshn yih khṭrh zi yihndis shhrs pytth kri ʿrbuk kanhh qbylh ḥmlh th qrysh ạsụ̄ chvnkh khanh kʿbs mujạvr. Aamhi mvjvb ạsụ̄ tihindụ̄ tjarty qạflh khocznh vrạe ʿrbh kyv tmam ʿlaqav kinụ̄ nyran th kanhh avs nh yimn aathh lagan.)
